name: adc_ltm_traffic_class_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()


def getLTMTrafficClassList():
    '''
    to get the list of LTM traffic class

    '''

    ltm_traffic_class_list = []
    adc_ltm_traffic_class_list = connect_db.appviewx.ltc.find()
    for device in adc_ltm_traffic_class_list:
        ltm_traffic_class_list.append(device)
    return ltm_traffic_class_list
description: To get a list of LTM traffic_class
_keywords: To get a list of LTM traffic_class
